title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-5.23 - Movable equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-5.23 - Movable equipment

State Regulations

Necessary and reasonable expenses related to movable equipment (depreciation computed on a straight-line method or accelerated under a double declining balance on sum-of-the-years-digits method, interest on indebtedness, lease, etc. pursuant to sections
86-5.17, 86-5.19, 86-5.20 and
86-5.22
of this Subpart) are considered to be allowable costs for LTHHCPs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-5.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
